snippet.title: Card Craft - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Strategize, collect, upgrade. Card Craft is a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by Triple Triad with deep meta-progression and replayability. Outwit your opponents on a 4x4 tactical grid, traverse the map, augment your cards, and combine abilities to ultimately build the most powerful deck. 

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1937110/Card_Craft/

Developed by indie team Hero's Journey in Oakland, CA. 

Releasing April 9, 2024!
